VERY  SIMPLE PRICING

Fully flexible, automatically adjusted with no hidden costs.

Starter

Applies to smaller sized projects with under 1000 API calls per month.

$0.20 /call

Buy plan
  • Dashboard access
  • Over 20 themes in our library
  • 24-hour support response time

Advanced

Once your project is a hit with over 1000 API calls per month, the price changes.

$0.10 /call

Buy plan
  • Dashboard access
  • Over 60 themes in our extended library
  • 24-hour support response time
  • Marketing automations
